title: WEATHER FORECAST FOR 29 JANUARY 2026 Issued at 2.00 p.m. on 28 January 2026 Mainly dry weather will prevail in the most parts of the island. Misty conditions can be expected at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central and North-western provinces and in Badulla, Galle, Matara and Anuradhapura districts during the early hours of the morning.
